requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Celeron 1.33 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GT 520 or above
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: 1024x768 Display or Higher (16:9 or 16:10 aspect is best)

  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GT 720 or above

  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: 1920x1080 Display or Higher (16:9 or 16:10 aspect is best)

results.name: The World's Hardest Game - On Steam

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows Vista/7/8/8.1 (64-bits)
  • Processor: Intel or AMD 2.0Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 25 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 64-bits OS and DirectX 11 capable graphics device are REQUIRED.
